gold_standard_statement:
[College Name] Statement Regarding Ongoing Investigation

“[College Name] has temporarily suspended a member of staff following concerns raised about their recent social media activity. This decision is a neutral step taken to allow a full and fair investigation to take place without prejudice.
We are committed to protecting both the right to lawful free expression and the right of our students and staff to work and study in an environment free from harassment or discrimination.

The investigation will consider all relevant evidence before reaching any conclusion. While that process is ongoing, we will not be making further comment. We ask for patience and respect for due process.”

— [College Principal / Spokesperson Name]
